ygData.subject: Re: The Ark
ygData.msgSnippet: (Stride, the CF has spare parts to replace broken ones.  That doesn t mean all of them would work in the Ark.  Also, it just has spare parts and scrap, it

(Stride, the CF has spare parts to replace broken ones.  That doesn't mean 
all of them would work in the Ark.  Also, it just has spare parts and scrap, 
it doesn't have enough to rebuild an entire ship.  You seem to not know the 
amount of damage the Ark has taken internally)
